column5: You mean “she” lol I’m a girl

First of this wasn’t my original post ..I didn’t ask if I should take 20mgs more? So where are you getting that? You must be smelling someone else’s bullshit..also methadone sucks ..analgesic effect only last 3 -4 hours max then wears out and you can only take so much bc it just piles up in your system. And yes in my area blues (30mgs) go for $35-40 each no matter how many you buy.
Definitely not..my friend gets 180 -30s every 10 days , but she’s also palliative
The Ms are def presses..you can tell by the “M” it’s too thick
Good idea. Always better to be safe than sorry.

I tried methadone and hated it. I was on it for 2 months. I get a script every month, it’s still expensive when I run out. Morphine sucks . Doesn’t last as long and you’d have to IV it to feel anything. I’ve been prescribed 18yrs now. I’ve tried it all believe me.
Yea lol ...I’ve been going to pain management for 18yrs now
Uh 15 of the 30mg pills is 450mg my friend...that’s on a bad day. Sometimes more. I refuse to switch to dope.

There is nothing to be ashamed of. Keep your chin up, keep pushing , the sun will shine on you again. I hope those assailants are treated the same way as they treated you when they go to prison. Being raped doesn’t make you gay, I hope she regrets that comment as long as she lives.
You can take it an hour before and test positive. Doesn’t matter when you take it. As long as they aren’t checking levels you’re fine
Dude I take 15-30mg pills a day lol
